name: Mr. Mark Dark: Jack O Lantern
name_original: Mr. Mark Dark: Jack O Lantern
description:
Join City Officer Mr. Mark and defeat Jack O Lantern summoned by the 'Dark Side' sisters to torment the 'Evercool' city folks in this modern 2D platformer.

Defeat hordes of Jack O' Lantern.

Fight awesome Boss Battles.

Collect lots and lots of Coins, Stars, Life, and Power-Ups.

Explore secret hidden Treasure Rooms.

Experience loads of thrilling Sound and Visual effects.

And

Enjoy a rich complete 2D Platformer Gameplay Experience.
